thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: This promo for UFC 193 stars Ronda Rousey's little sister and is amazing
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Watch: This promo for UFC 193 stars Ronda Rousey's little sister and is amazing - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Man-Cave | Watch: This promo for UFC 193 stars Ronda Rousey's little sister and is amazing
text:
Ronda Rousey is now officially a household name. The fighter, actress and writer has firmly crossed over into the mainstream and is the modern combat sports version of Mike Tyson in his prime.
Arguably the UFC's biggest star (you could make a case for our own Conor McGregor), Rousey will headline a stadium show in Australia against former pro boxer Holly Holm that will house 70,000 fans. It's the biggest event the UFC have ever hosted.
This superb promo gives a little insight to the woman and her amazing career. Also, that's her little sister at the start who's the IMAGE of her and her Judo champion mam.
Via The 42
